lead_paragraph: On bridges and rooftops, police officers in the Emergency Service Unit reach out for that one emotional chord that will change a suicidal mind.
snippet: On bridges and rooftops, police officers in the Emergency Service Unit reach out for that one emotional chord that will change a suicidal mind....

headline.seo: Police Jumper Squads Spend Tense Hours Trying to Save People From Themselves

abstract: New York Police Department's Emergency Service Unit responds to hundreds of calls each year about people threatening to jump off buildings and bridges; unit's roughly 300 officers are specially trained in suicide response and the complex art of finding the emotional chords that will change a suicidal mind.
